Articles.Content:
Hey, why not. I'm happy to be back again, and these forums are purdy!

Now let's have a part-ay!

How long has it been since the forums were ported, anyway?

Party Agenda:

1. Get people

2. Get party equipment

3. Throw it all together

4. Fire it out a cannon

5. Get a survivor to remind me to buy KSP

6. Get someone to explain how everything's changed

7. Hibernate for another few months

Edited August 14, 2012 by CarolRawley

Welcome back!

It's been maybe around a week since the forums were ported.

1. I'm here!

2. Equipment? Like uh, fireworks and beer?

3. Sounds good.

4. *BOOM*

5. Buy KSP! Quick, before the price increases!

6. Uhm. That's a long list. Let's just start with new larger parts and bigger explosions, oh, and Kerbals can get out and walk around.

7. Sleep is for the weak!

Edited August 14, 2012 by Ziff
Removed Quotes

CAROOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOL

This time, don't leave. Ever.

Also, original cat avatar ftw.
Ah, The fabled Carol Rawley! I've heard alot about you. I wasn't around back in your day, But it's good to see you're back all the same!
Amen brothers and sisters. HE HAS RETURNED!

You do know that you basically created RP, right?

It all goes back to you and the first company.
Wow, these forums are active now. Haha, that's good, I guess.

I've actually started working on a brief RL history of RP, regarding how it was put together and such. Since you are active now, I might need to hit you up with a few interviews!

I just can't stop saying this but you really are the father of the roleplaying forums. Every event goes all the way back to you. Not kidding! Welcome back!

(brony too? this can't get any more awesome)
Tim, all of the RP'ers should get together and make a comprehensive history of RP. 'Cause we're the special people.

Well Tim, feel free to hit me up whenever I'm online. Although, it may be bit annoying considering time differences.

EDIT: Being an unknown quantity is fun

EDIT EDIT: If you're serious about the interview thing, just PM me some questions and I'll answer them and send them back.

Edited August 15, 2012 by CarolRawley

At first I was like "Who is this guy. I've been here for like, ever, so I should at least have heard of this said Carol"

And then I saw your avatar

"Oh" Said my mouth with comedic feline realization

Welcome back
